The story:

Dash Brawl presents the story of a little boy going on an amazing adventure hoping to achieve his dream. His dream is to become a ninja and protect his village against dangerous creatures. To do that he must face a lot of creatures and a lot of challenges. It will not be easy, but with great efforts comes great results.

The gameplay:

Dash Brawl is a fun game in which the player has only one attack mechanic: dashing. There are different types of creatures to fight and the player must develop different technics to beat them. The simplicity of the attack mechanic encourages the player to think of new ways of using the dash to attack, avoid, and any different strategy that the player might think of.

How to play:

Mobile: Move with the joystick from the left side of the screen and attack by tapping anywhere on the right side of the screen.

Windows: Move with the joystick from the left side of the screen and attack by pressing "Enter".
